reviews.review: Excelente juego apesar de que sea tan viejo nunca pasa de moda

Esta muy bueno . solo algo que no me gusta, que te banean minutos en competitivo al expulsar. yo termino expulsando aquellos que usan hack o se quedan bugeados, y solo por eso aumenta cada vez el tiempo baneado. Solo eso lo demas muy bueno.
really fun game but super hard

A game that still the best for my opinion.

Hope more people restart or start to play these game !
Old memories, old graphics, but this game is a legend!

I used to 1v1 with friends with this game very fun times

Graphics: If you are looking at getting this game look past the graphics

Gameplay: Fast, responsive, fun to play.

Game world: Well laid out levels that are still being remade today

conclusion: Counter strike doesn't have many players anymore but if you want some good old fashoned action this game is for you 9/10
